channel.title: This is making me mad! help please!
channel.description: how do i make it so only 2 connections per ip can loggin these stupid spammers r making me mad, or atleast gimme a link to a tut i cant find 1, btw its a 508

item.title: This is making me mad! help please!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:2, topic:308469”]why would you make it 2 connections and not just one!?
and even if u do that they could just use an autotyper…[/quote]

In my server some people have brother/family/friends
that play the server on the same computer/ip.

Read full topic
item.source: This is making me mad! help please!

item.title: This is making me mad! help please!
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:2, topic:308469”]why would you make it 2 connections and not just one!?
and even if u do that they could just use an autotyper…[/quote]

Some people have the same Internet Protocol (IP). Example: Two of my IRL friends who play my RuneScape Private Server. (RSPS). I had 1 connection, but I changed to two, because it’s not hard to IP ban someone.

Read full topic
